aboutMe.title: About Me üëã
aboutMe.content: Hi! I'm Jonatan‚Äîa senior front-end developer who loves building things that actually work and don't break the moment you look away.

expertise.title: My Expertise ‚öõÔ∏è
expertise.content: I specialize in React, Redux, TypeScript, and scalable architectures, making sure everything runs smoothly and stays maintainable.

experience.title: Experience üèóÔ∏è
experience.content: I've worked on large-scale applications, mentored developers, and helped teams clean up messy codebases. I write clean, efficient code that keeps projects scalable instead of turning into tech debt.

community.title: Community & Writing ‚úçÔ∏è
community.content: I contribute to Stack Overflow, write about development, and stay updated with the latest in tech.

communication.title: Communication is key ü§ù

publications.title: Latest Publications

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Validated expertise across multiple platforms and technologies

whyHire.title: Why Hire a Certified Developer?
whyHire.p1: Anyone can write code, but not everyone writes scalable, maintainable, and high-quality code.
whyHire.p2: Certifications go beyond badges; they're proof that an external authority has reviewed, tested, and validated both knowledge and skills.
whyHire.p3: When you hire a certified developer, you're not just trusting what they say ‚Äî you're trusting what they've proven.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about how I can help.
contact.description: I'm open to new projects and collaborations. If you're looking for a developer or have a relevant opportunity, please feel free to reach out. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
